references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational Latent Diffusion Model (LDM) architecture which the current work builds upon and extends.

references.paper_title: DemoFusion: Democratising high-resolution image generation with no $$$
references.reason: This paper is a direct antecedent which tackles similar challenges of high resolution image generation without retraining, allowing for direct comparison and improvement.

references.paper_title: MultiDiffusion: fusing diffusion paths for controlled image generation
references.reason: This paper explores a related approach to improving image generation, providing context within the broader field of diffusion models.
This paper is a highly influential foundational work on diffusion models that is frequently cited in the domain.

references.paper_title: Photoswap: Personalized subject swapping in images
references.reason: This paper introduces an attention swapping mechanism, a technique relevant to the attention modulation component of the current work.
